resources.description: Provides comprehensive details about discovered assets, vulnerabilities, and users.
resources.name: Audit Report

resources.description: Compares current scan results to those of an earlier baseline scan.
resources.name: Baseline Comparison

resources.description: Provides a high-level view of security data, including general results information and statistical charts.
resources.name: Executive Overview

resources.description: Provides information and metrics about 10 discovered vulnerabilities with the highest risk scores.
resources.name: Highest Risk Vulnerabilities

resources.description: Lists results for standard policy scans (AS/400, Oracle, Domino, Windows Group, CIFS/SMB account). Does not include Policy Manager results.
resources.name: Policy Evaluation

resources.description: Provides detailed remediation instructions for each discovered vulnerability.
resources.name: Remediation Plan

resources.description: Lists test results for each discovered vulnerability, including how it was verified.
resources.name: Report Card
